name: EditChecklist
description:
Rename or reorder a task checklist in ClickUp.

Use this tool to rename a checklist or change its order within a task in ClickUp. It is suitable when you need to update the checklist name or adjust its position in relation to other checklists in a specific task.

parameters.name: checklist_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of the checklist to be edited or reordered.

parameters.name: checklist_name
parameters.description: The new name for the checklist. Leave empty if you do not wish to rename.

parameters.name: checklist_position
parameters.description: Specify the order in which the checklist should appear on a task. Use 0 to place it at the top.

value_schema.description:
Position refers to the order of appearance of checklists on a task.\
 \
To set a checklist to appear at the top of the checklists section of a task, use `"position": 0`.
